paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the TTR gene, including penetrance data.

patients.demographics: median age 41.3 years, both male and female

individual_records.phenotype_details: developed clinical manifestations of ATTRv amyloidosis
individual_records.evidence_sentence: During regular monitoring visits following PST, 26 pre-symptomatic carriers developed clinical manifestations of ATTRv amyloidosis.

functional_data.summary: The Val30Met mutation is associated with a late-onset phenotype.

variants.segregation_data: Yes, segregates with disease in families.
variants.population_frequency: 25% of identified mutations in the Italian population.
variants.additional_notes: The Val30Met mutation is the most frequent variant associated with ATTRv.
key_quotes: More than 130 different mutations of TTR have been identified worldwide.
The first-described Val30Met mutation is the most frequent and may be associated with an early-onset phenotype.

patients.demographics: median age 41.3 years, both male and female

functional_data.summary: The Ile68Leu mutation is one of the common mutations associated with ATTRv.

variants.segregation_data: Yes, segregates with disease in families.

variants.additional_notes: The Ile68Leu mutation is prevalent in the Italian population.
